access: Pine leshies have access to this feat
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Towering Growth](/Feats.aspx?ID=3432) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 77</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Pine Leshy](/Heritages.aspx?ID=198) heritage

**Access**
Pine leshies have access to this feat

</column>

---

You're capable of growing as tall as a pine tree for a short time. You gain 2nd-level [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) as a primal innate spell. You can cast this spell twice per day and you must target yourself.
